page.title: 12THE MAY SHOW - CLAWTON
page.content: The{May Show}is organised by the {Y.F.C.}-{Young Farmer Club.}It has been held for{23 years. The May Show is held at the{Parish {Hall}at{Clawton}and have a marquee in the field at the Parish Hall. The{Y.F.C.}holds the{May Show}every year.It is an{annual event. In the{Parish Hall}they have cookery,needle work and flower arranging{classes}In cookery there are so many different kinds of food that we cook and there are so many types of needle work,we have to have classes.Other{classes}include{Clawton {C.P.School}entries,names of homes,crops and the longest read or dock or stinging nettle. the Young Farmers have a different {Show Secretary. The{Young Farmers}give{cups},for the most{points}for under sixteen.
